patthana20.5:1.1: Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:2.1: Naanārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:3.1: Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.5:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:5.1: Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:6.1: Nanocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.5:7.1: Nacittañca nanocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.5:9.1: Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.5:10.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:11.1: Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana20.5:12.1: Nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana20.5:13.1: Nacittasampayuttañca nacittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.5:14.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:15.1: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavisaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho ca cittavisaṃsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.5:16.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:17.1: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.5:18.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:19.1: Nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.5:20.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:21.1: Nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittānuparivattī ca nocittānuparivattī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.5:22.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:23.1: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.5:24.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:25.1: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.5:26.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:27.1: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.5:28.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:29.1: Naajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:30.1: Nabāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:31.1: Naajjhattikañca nabāhirañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.5:32.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.5:33.1: Naupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca upādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.5:34.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana20.5:35.1: Naupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.5:36.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
